numbers.sectionSubtitle: Discover the Facts that Drive Success

startups.title: Number of startups in our region last year
startups.description1: The General Authority for Small and Medium Enterprises "Monshaat" announced that the number of small and medium enterprises in the Kingdom reached 1.2 million enterprises, an increase of 4.8% compared to the fourth quarter of 2022.
startups.description2: Saudi Arabia recorded a 108% growth in the number of small and medium enterprises since 2016, according to Prince Fahd bin Mansour bin Nasser bin Abdulaziz, head of the Kingdom's delegation to the G20 Young Entrepreneurs Alliance Summit for 2024.
startups.description3: It was also mentioned that Saudi Arabia ranked first in venture capital financing in the Middle East and North Africa region, in addition to achieving 50% of the market share in the region, with an annual growth rate of 33%.
startups.description4: This growth reflects an increase in entrepreneurial spirit and young people's desire for innovation. With more than 2000 new companies, it shows that the market is heading towards more diversity and innovation.
